mapper.select: SELECT n_patientMedicine.p_id pid, n_nonDrug.d_name name, n_nonDrug.d_price dprice, n_orderDrug.o_number number FROM n_orderDrug INNER JOIN n_patientMedicine ON n_patientMedicine.p_id = n_orderDrug.o_id INNER JOIN n_nonDrug ON n_orderDrug.o_drugId = n_nonDrug.d_id WHERE n_patientMedicine.p_id = #{id} ORDER BY n_patientMedicine.p_id

SELECT n_nonDrug.d_price price, n_orderDrug.o_number number FROM n_orderDrug INNER JOIN n_patientMedicine ON n_patientMedicine.p_id = n_orderDrug.o_id INNER JOIN n_nonDrug ON n_orderDrug.o_drugId = n_nonDrug.d_id WHERE n_patientMedicine.p_id = #{id} ORDER BY n_patientMedicine.p_id

SELECT n_nonDrug.d_id id, n_nonDrug.d_price price, n_orderDrug.o_number number, n_patientMedicine.p_price pprice, n_nonDrug.d_name name FROM n_orderDrug INNER JOIN n_patientMedicine ON n_patientMedicine.p_id = n_orderDrug.o_id INNER JOIN n_nonDrug ON n_orderDrug.o_drugId = n_nonDrug.d_id WHERE n_patientMedicine.p_id = #{id} ORDER BY n_patientMedicine.p_id

SELECT n_patientMedicine.p_id pid, n_patientMedicine.p_date pdate, n_patientMedicine.p_price price , n_user.u_username username, n_user.u_identityNumber identityNumber, n_doctor.d_name dname, n_department.d_name dename, n_generalItem.value registered FROM n_patientMedicine INNER JOIN n_user ON n_user.u_id = n_patientMedicine.p_userId INNER JOIN n_doctor ON n_doctor.d_id = n_patientMedicine.p_doctorId INNER JOIN n_department ON n_doctor.d_department = n_department.d_id INNER JOIN n_registered ON n_doctor.d_regis = n_registered.r_id INNER JOIN n_generalItem ON n_generalItem.coding = n_registered.r_name WHERE n_patientMedicine.p_id = #{id}

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(n_doctor.d_id) FROM n_doctor) 医生数量, (SELECT COUNT(n_user.u_id) FROM n_user) 患者数量, (SELECT COUNT(n_patientMedicine.p_id) FROM n_patientMedicine) 订单数量, COUNT(n_nonDrug.d_id) 药品数量 FROM n_nonDrug
SELECT COUNT(p_id) value,n_generalItem.value name FROM n_patientMedicine INNER JOIN n_generalItem ON n_patientMedicine.p_state=n_generalItem.coding GROUP BY p_state
